item.title: The Fall of Assad
item.description: It’s difficult to shed any tears about the fall of an evil dictator. But our hopes for a new Syria will be tempered by trepidation.

item.title: The Perplexing Postelection Pessimism of White Evangelicals
item.description: Some in this demographic view Trump’s win not as a relief but only as a temporary reprieve against a rapidly secularizing America.

item.title: The Six Stages of Grief for Biden Boosters
item.description: An additional stage exists for anyone dumb enough to have taken Biden at his word.

item.title: Remembering America’s Greatest Passenger Ship — and a Great Leader
item.description: A personal reminiscence of the SS United States .

item.title: A Recipe for a Relaxing Holiday Meal
item.description: Prepare most dishes in advance, and focus on the foods you truly love.
